v8:item.v8:content: Separate group (cl.1, art.322 of the Tax Code of the Russian Federation)
НДС относится на указанный вид налогообложения:
VAT is related to the specified taxation kind
VAT is allocated in proportion to revenue

Residual running time on the last renovation date.
